programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elvira and Robert are looking for a home with a history, but want to make sure it is post-renovation.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jonathan and Kerry are in the market for a new home to share memories in with their family; with a budget of 12 million dollars, Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri is challenged to find the family their dream home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Nathan, a start up company owner and his fiance Kelsey, a owner of a holistic nutrition company, are open to purchasing a house anywhere in the GTA.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Broker Jasmine Xuereb must smooth the way for buyers Cindy and Andrew to decide whether they should buy a house in their homeland or in a different country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Real Estate Agents Jasmine Xuereb & Laura Compagni team up to aid power couple Jamie and Jennifer in purchasing either a real estate investment in Canada or Belize.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The brokers explore Central America to find real estate options that fit the bill for two buyers looking for a change of scene.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Since working from home has become increasingly popular, Paul and Sonia are entertaining the idea of living and working abroad.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria can't decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshall's homeland) or Cuba (Maria's homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a truculent man is sent to the drunk-tank to sober up. In Portland, OR a drunk woman is jailed for attacking a child. In Sarasota, FL an intoxicated man has difficulty recalling why he's been arrested. In Spokane, WA a man "borrows" a car to curb his drug habit.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A party of three girls are brought in after having been arrested for possession at a nearby music festival. Drugs are found on the person of a music festival attendee during intake. A slightly older party goer is taken into custody for possession.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR a man in custody accuses officers of being involved in the 1992 event at Ruby Ridge. In Sarasota, FL a drunk man falls off his bike and purports to have been hit by a car. programme.sub-title: S26 : E21 Hands Off The Junk
programme.desc: A passenger bails from a fleeing stolen vehicle then claims that he was only getting a ride. An undercover officer pulls a sting on a handsy prostitute. An anxious lady gets nabbed for weed after calling the police on her quarrelsome husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Two suspects hit a car with their U-Haul truck. A suspect flees on foot after a car pursuit. An elderly man is selling fake jewelry.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a truck driving backwards on a freeway. A suspect jumps a train to evade police. A woman claims to be disabled when a pill falls from her pocket.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A speedy suspect makes officers chase him through a creek. A teenage Good Samaritan gets in the middle of a bizarre domestic dispute. After a woman destroys her home, she begs police to arrest her.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A prostitute tries to outrun the police during a foot chase. A man claims he can only meet women at motels since he lives with his mom. A prostitute fresh out of jail protests that he’s not trying to return to his old career.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police follow a car after it leaves a drug house. A police officer in Las Vegas goes undercover posing as a ‘john.’ Officers give chase when they observe a car making an illegal U-Turn.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers enlist the help of a K-9 unit after suspects in a dangerous high-speed chase abandon their car in a residential area. A woman with visible injuries tells the Officer that her husband assaulted her after they left a drive-in. A woman sprays her boyfriend with mace when she sees him with another woman.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man tosses his stash after being pulled over. Officers question two men in a fight who live with the same woman. A man says his shorts are from a thrift store after drugs are found in them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An extremely understanding cop gives a resistant suspect too many chances. A driver reminds us why we should never let a friend borrow our car. A man with a supped-up vehicle tells an awful lie to police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A remorseful woman is arrested for lewd conduct during Mardi Gras. Officers are dispatched into the busy streets of New Orleans during the super bowl. Officers investigates a theft at a local store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An assailant attacks a woman after bumping into her. A woman is arrested for spilling beer on a cameraman’s equipment. Two intoxicated women are placed under arrest after a physical altercation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E06 The House Always Wins
programme.desc: A suspect runs from an illegal gambling game claiming shots were fired. A man is caught trespassing on school grounds. A male driver wearing a halter top is pulled over for a minor traffic violation.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A K-9 unit finds the suspect hiding in a shed. A cooperative suspect is faced with a list of charges. A motorcycle chase comes to an end after the suspect ditches the stolen bike and flees on foot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers engage in a high-speed pursuit of a stolen vehicle. Police spot a motel fire, alert the guests and contact the Fire Department. Officers pursue a suspect on a stolen motorcycle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers break up a fight between a couple in the middle of the street. Not even a church is immune to being robbed. A dispute between neighbors involves deadly weapons.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A kind man gets more than he bargained for from his new roommate. Cops discover the unexpected consequences of punching a scooter. Officers stop a sober suspect who may not be from the same planet as them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The suspect of a carjacking tells an Officer that he would rather go to jail than face the wrath of his mother. An Officer investigates a domestic call involving a husband, wife and a lamp. A slow speed pursuit ensues and the suspects are booked for felony, eluding, and drugs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man fights with his wife over a haircut then leads police on a car chase. A woman gets violent with her boyfriend and then calls the police on him. An intoxicated woman tells deputies she only had two drinks.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man rams his wife’s car into his daughter’s car. Deputies find a rifle in a suspect’s car that was in a prior altercation. A man claims to run a travel business after deputies find evidence of id theft.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police work a sting that targets drug dealers. An undercover sting discovers narcotics trafficking. Police respond to a burglary in progress and discover a flop house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E01 He's the Gingerbread Man
programme.desc: A man wanted for unpaid child support hides from deputies. Officers respond to a sexual predator following a minor. A man with a checkered driving record crashes his car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E05 Put Your Clothes Back On
programme.desc: Cops try desperately to get an unclothed man to cooperate. After a chase with a pickup truck, officers find a 14-year-old in the driver’s seat. On a routine traffic stop, police contend with a plethora of dope and even more lies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E19 Make it a Large Soda
programme.desc: A motorcyclist refuses to stop for the police and later tries to escape on foot. A pedestrian is found to have a large soda cup full of anything but soda. A man calls for police help when he’s verbally attacked on a city bus.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two juveniles involved in a carjacking. Two men sitting in a truck are spotted hiding something in the console. A man claims he took drug paraphernalia from kids as a good samaritan.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police conduct a sting operation. A woman is covered in white powder during a traffic stop. Officers spot a young boy on a bike who wandered away from home.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A carjacking results in a chase and a flipped vehicle. Suspects crash a truck after attempting to steal beer. A man attempts to swallow his drugs during a bust.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called to a burglary at a warehouse housing expensive items. Police are called to the scene of a threatening man with a knife. Officers thwart an attempted suicide during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two brothers after an attempted bank robbery. A confused man with a shotgun calls police after hearing voices. A man asks deputies for a break after they find illegal items in his truck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman tells Officers she’s a vampire. Officers question a colorful man dressed as a woman. A violent woman screams obscenities at Officers and needs to be restrained.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover Officers organize a buy-bust sting. Racoons hide out in a woman's chimney. A man gets pulled over for soliciting a prostitute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man in New Jersey is arrested for possession. A couple is pulled over while looking to score. A routine traffic stop turns into a fruitful drug bust.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E09 Crazy as a Loon
programme.desc: Officers conduct a traffic stop on a vehicle that ran a stop sign. Officers retrieve birds from a fireplace and release them outside. Officers conduct a drug-reversal-buy sting to capture buyers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E10 Tire Iron Road Rage
programme.desc: Officers respond to a traffic dispute involving an assault with a tire iron. Police are led to a battered woman after she dials 911. Officers on patrol encounter a couple engaged in prostitution.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E19 You Didn't Get Very Far
programme.desc: A husky cyclist takes a spill when he tries to flee. Officers chase a suspect in a stolen car who says he was just fixing it for a friend. A man's denials of drug use lose credibility when cops find a meth pipe in his vehicle

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspicious man attempts to flee Police on foot and is later arrested for possession. Officers in New Jersey charge a garage owner with receiving stolen property. Officers arrest a man after witnesses report purse snatching.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect is arrested after officers find a loaded gun during a routine search. Two men are detained after suspected of battery. Officers arrest a man pick-pocketing during Mardi Gras.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A chase ends when a driver-less vehicle goes headfirst into an apartment complex. A swift suspect can’t scamper fast enough to evade police. On routine patrol, officers stumble upon a 7-year-old boy who left home alone.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A hit and run call results in the intoxicated suspect being coaxed out of his car at gun-point. Officers respond to a stabbing and the victim is rushed to the hospital by paramedics. Officers give a tour of a newly renovated jail in Maricopa County, AZ.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The Organized Crime Unit places officers undercover as drug dealers on a street corner for a drug-reversal sting operation. programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man throws out his narcotics during a foot-chase with police. A woman is arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Officers call for back-up after a woman is held at knife-point.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E26 Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A jaywalker darts on a mad dash through the weeds. Things go badly for a suspect on a stolen motorcycle when choppers help officers track him down. A domestic dispute leads cops to a slew of unexpected crimes.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers coax a man off a large construction crane. An inebriated man is jailed for domestic abuse. A man is rescued from a flash flood, but his truck isn’t so lucky.

programme.sub-title: S24 : E17 Two Mr. Fix Its

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drunk driver rams into a pursuing police car. A man on a bike flees an area known for drug activity on a bike. A sniffling man attempts to hide a baggie with narcotics under his shirt.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called when a disturbed naked man covered in blood is spotted in a park. Officers find a nude couple in a U-Haul truck. A traffic stop over a minor violation turns into a dangerous pursuit.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An attempted pull over results in a foot chase and eventual arrest. An officer makes a drug-related arrest during a routine traffic stop. An officer makes a sizeable drug seizure during a field sobriety check.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect has a change of heart after he leads police on a pursuit. An Officer discovers sterile syringes and rocks in a suspicious man’s pocket after he is stopped and searched. A woman is arrested for stealing C.D's out of a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An out-of-control woman needs to be subdued after an arrest. Deputies spot an erratic driver who appears to be under the influence. A car is seen driving backwards on a one-way street.

programme.desc: A jaywalker with no ID bolts away from an officer. A man mixes illicit items with his pizza. A woman involved in a domestic violence call blames her monthly issues.

programme.desc: A bewildered driver claims that he did not see the lights or hear the sirens when signaled to stop. A manager of an apartment complex is assaulted by their intoxicated tenants.

programme.desc: A driver bails out of his vehicle after an attempted traffic stop, the suspect is ultimately tased and arrested. An officer assists with a fight call on the Las Vegas Strip. A Florida man is arrested after an unlikely story is deemed inaccurate.

programme.desc: A high speed chase comes to a halt in a residential area and the driver is taken in for sobriety testing. programme.desc: Officers respond to an armed robbery and carjacking, the suspects are arrested on several charges. A concerned sister reports a fight between her brother and a heavyset burglar. Officers pursue a stolen vehicle and a high speed chase ensues which ends in a wreck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer struggles with a man reaching for something in his pocket. A man won’t cop to the gun in his backseat. Police arrive on the scene when a man threatens to shoot his wife.

programme.desc: A family with kids is taken on a high speed car chase. A intoxicated suspect tries to jump a fence while protesting that he’s not trying to run away. A jealous boyfriend terrorizes his girlfriend and her parents.

programme.title: Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.desc: Spencer Watts serves up his take on traditional holiday fare, showing us that you can make an impressive dinner without the stress. In this cheerful one-hour special, charming bachelor Spencer takes you through all the planning tips and lets you in on his secrets to create the ultimate holiday meal.

programme.title: BLITZ'N
programme.desc: Get ready for a special holiday BLITZ! with master mixologist Yvonne Langen as she prepares her favorite holiday cocktails and party snacks in the Gusto TV kitchen!

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kohlrabi, Fennel, Kale and Red Cabbage
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera shows us why fresh is always best with two creative dishes using ingredients from the farmers' market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Raspberries, Mint, Peas and Apricot
programme.desc: Zestful cook Amanda Herrera scoops up raspberries, peas, mint, and apricots to use in three summer recipes.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Collard Greens, Maple Syrup, Goat Cheddar and Heirloom Cherry Tomatoes
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera prepares a frittata, rosemary skewer chicken and grilled bread salad with fresh ingredients from a local farmers' market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Broccoli, Rainbow Chard and Herbs
programme.desc: Warm host Amanda Herrera picks up colourful produce and herbs at a farmers' market to make a delicious appetizer and tasty cold oil French fries.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Thai food inspired by other cultures
programme.desc: Thai chef and cookbook author Pailin Chongchitnant shows us how to make Thai dishes that were inspired by other cultures, from steamed dumplings to biryani to Massaman curry and custard tarts.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Argentinian-born chef Natalia Machado makes grilled calamari salad, followed by grilled pizza, and then shows us how to make lamb ravioli, before finishing it off with the best-ever cookies: alfajores.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Warm and talented Cantonese home cook Mary Tang kick starts this One World Kitchen 3 episode by show- casing traditional, evERS-popular dim-sum dishes. First up, juicy Pork-Filled Dumplings! Made with fresh watERS-chest- nuts, shiitake mushrooms and a blend of Asian sauces and spices, these sweet and salty bite-sized creations are to die for! To add to our desire, Mary fries up some savoury Chinese Daikon Radish Cakes in a piping hot wok. Next, a flavourful lotus leaf filled with sticky rice and a medley of salted duck eggs, Shaoxing wine, and dried shrimp is truly hard to resist! To finish off, Mary combines gorgeous Adzuki beans with rice flour and sesame seeds to create airy and full...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Vietnamese food with a French Twist
programme.desc: Lisa Nguyen, a passionate and fun-loving Vietnamese home cook, introduces us to some of her favourite Vietnamese dishes with a French flare. Set in the colourful One World Kitchen 3 kitchen, Lisa assembles a classic Vietnamese sandwich. Golden-brown sautéed onions, salty bacon, tangy pickled carrots and daikon, and flavourful ground pork p'té pressed between two slices of crispy baguette will definitely get your mouth salivating. Next up, hot pork lathered in cognac inside a crunchy golden puff pastry. Moving away from pork, Lisa then cooks up a hearty plate of Shaking Beef with a leafy watercress salad on the side. Finally, Lisa shows us her Vietnamese play on a traditional French...

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Vietnam, Lebanon, China, Germany
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Vietnam - Vietnamese Green Beans, Lebanon - Watermelon Tabbouleh, China - Signapore-Style Spaghetti Squash Noodles, and Germany - Celeriac Sauerbraten and Slaw!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Italy, Morocco, Ethiopia, Jamaica
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Italy - Roasted Radishes and Radish Pesto, Morocco - Moroccan Spiced Apples, Ethiopia - Ethiopian Spinach Dip, and Jamaica - Jerk Shiitakes with Coconut Rice!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Korea, Russia, Spain, El Salvador
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by South Korea - Jicama Kimchi, Russia - Roasted Eggplant Salad, Spain - Quinoa Paella, and El Salvador - Salvadorian Grilled Iceberg Lettuce Wedge!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Indonesia, Greece, Syria, Thailand
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Indonesia - Tomato Nasi Goreng, Greece - Greek Melon Salad, Syria - Kidney Bean Hummus, and Thailand - Coconut Curry Cabbage Rolls!

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Honeycomb, Shallots and Iceberg Lettuce
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera transforms fresh market ingredients into two irresistible dishes, including a one pot Lamb Curry with Honeycomb.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Patty Pan Summer Squash and Cabbage
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera grills up two dinner recipes using patty pan summer squash and cabbage that she picked up from the market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Beans, Raspberry Jam and Relish
programme.desc: On today's Fresh Market Dinners menu, host Amanda Herrera prepares succulent burgers with golden fries and a refreshing cocktail.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Cream, Sunflower Oil and Cherry Tomatoes
programme.desc: Using cream, sunflower oil and cherry tomatoes from the market, host Amanda Herrera makes an irresistible pasta recipe and indulgent dessert.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini uses the fresh ingredients from rich Tuscan soil to make regional dishes like Spinach Ricotta Gnudi.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini explores classic dishes from the central Italian region, Le Marche.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: The secluded region of Abruzzo makes for unique Italian cuisine. Chef Michael Bonacini shows us diverse regional recipes like Rolled Meat Crepes.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Pasta, bread, pizza dough! Host Michael Bonacini makes Apulian classics like Artichoke Cheese Panzerotti.

programme.desc: MKHBB

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Vietnamese food with a French Twist
programme.desc: Lisa Nguyen, a passionate and fun-loving Vietnamese home cook, introduces us to some of her favourite Vietnamese dishes with a French flare. Set in the colourful One World Kitchen 3 kitchen, Lisa assembles a classic Vietnamese sandwich. Golden-brown sautéed onions, salty bacon, tangy pickled carrots and daikon, and flavourful ground pork p'té pressed between two slices of crispy baguette will definitely get your mouth salivating. Next up, hot pork lathered in cognac inside a crunchy golden puff pastry. Moving away from pork, Lisa then cooks up a hearty plate of Shaking Beef with a leafy watercress salad on the side. Finally, Lisa shows us her Vietnamese play on a traditional French...

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of Vietnamese style clams, braised greens, balsamic Cipollini onions, pork chops with grilled peaches, and avocado cake with avocado frosting.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: There's nothing more authentic than street food - Vietnamese style! Host Lisa Nguyen shares her tips and tricks on tasty Lemongrass-infused Beef Wraps. A vast array of ingredients including peppery betel leaves, gorgeous greens and crunchy peanuts complement the tenderness of flavoursome, marinated ground beef. Lisa's next dish is an iconic Vietnamese street food - crispy Sizzling Crepes with juicy pork belly and earthy vegetables will definitely activate your taste buds. For dessert, Lisa whips up a batch of sweet coconut pudding using beautiful bananas and velvety coconut milk sprinkled with roasted sesame seeds for some crunch.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Four Flavours, Four Dishes…One Multi-Cooker!
programme.desc: Using just one pot, host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks four delicious dishes including Peachy Pulled Pork Tacos and a Lime and Basil Pie.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Say goodbye to dirty cutlery in this One World Kitchen 3 episode featuring Vietnamese finger foods! Talented cook Lisa Nguyen starts off by making delicious Pork Skewer Rolls - perfect for any party! Featuring tender pork, crispy lettuce, fresh mint, crunchy cucumber, and Chinese chives wrapped in soft rice paper, this dish pairs well with a nuoc cham dipping sauce. Sticky Lemongrass Spare Ribs are next up to the plate; steamed and marinated in a garlicy, caramel glaze (yum!). Next, Lisa fries up some tasty Shrimp and Sweet Potato Fritters using a foolproof technique, adding nuoc cham dipping sauce and lovely Bibb lettuce on the side. Finally, fingERS-licking Vietnamese Coffee Cupcakes...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 A Banquet fit for an Emperor
programme.desc: Elegant Vietnamese fare is often inspired by legendary imperial city cuisine. In this One World Kitchen 3 episode, Host Lisa Nguyen gives us a magical taste of royalty with four colourful and delectable dishes. To start, Lisa ex- quisitely assembles a nice little starter for a royal dinner party - delicious Rice Cakes with Dried Shrimp. Next, she kicks it up a notch with a Spicy Hue Beef Noodle Soup - a truly slurp-worthy dish! For a touch of sweetness, Lisa then steams caramelized pork and tender shrimp dumplings in a lovely banana leaf. And there's no such thing as a classy Vietnamese dinner party without Baby Clams with Rice! The blend of contrasting flavours and textures in this...

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Who said dessert couldn't come before dinner? In this episode of Up the Dish, host Missy Hui serves up a hedonistically hard-to-beat Carrot Cake, made extra-moist with applesauce and tons of cream cheese icing. Micah Trainor ditches dessert and heads for the healthy option - a Cider Poached Chicken Waldorf Salad full of pecans and cinnamon for that classic cake flavour. Poppy Sandler innovates with Indian inspiration - carrot cake becomes Carrot Rostis, thin pancakes dished out with perfectly poached eggs and a homemade savoury raisin jam. programme.title: Crate to Plate

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Who said dessert couldn't come before dinner? In this episode of Up the Dish, host Missy Hui serves up a hedonistically hard-to-beat Carrot Cake, made extra-moist with applesauce and tons of cream cheese icing. Micah Trainor ditches dessert and heads for the healthy option - a Cider Poached Chicken Waldorf Salad full of pecans and cinnamon for that classic cake flavour. Poppy Sandler innovates with Indian inspiration - carrot cake becomes Carrot Rostis, thin pancakes dished out with perfectly poached eggs and a homemade savoury raisin jam. Tiera Singh returns to the Rock and makes Jerk Crab Salad Mango Rolls. Jazzing up the crab meat with a blend of Jamaican jerk and autumn spices, she...

programme.title: North Island's Waterfalls: New Zealand
programme.desc: The North Island region of New Zealand is home to several stunning waterfalls, from tall streams that snake over towering cliffsides to short yet wide plunges of cascading waters.

programme.title: The Soothing Sun
programme.desc: Rejoice and relax in the splendor of the glorious Sun for a full hour, with this new video by David Huting.

programme.title: Outdoor Fire
programme.desc: A cozy outdoor fire with breathtaking views of a snowy lake and forest.

programme.title: Humpback Whales
programme.desc: Observe the humble humpback in all its glory. Few things are more majestic than a whale in its natural habitat: a gentle giant that inhabits every one of the world's oceans.

programme.title: Winter Wonderland
programme.desc: The calming effects of snow as it blankets roads, forests, and mountains in preparation for winter.

programme.title: Far North Beaches: New Zealand
programme.desc: The tranquil beaches of New Zealand's Far North, complete with small coves.

programme.title: Iceland From Above
programme.desc: Iceland From Above.

programme.title: Paradise Palms
programme.desc: Paradise Palms

programme.title: Lombok Beaches: Indonesia
programme.desc: Experiencing the beaches of an Indonesian island set to a peaceful soundtrack.

programme.title: Glacial Beauty: Newfoundland
programme.desc: Admiring the quiet and glacial beauty of icebergs drifting across the bay at Newfoundland's Amherst Cove.

programme.title: Coral Kingdom
programme.desc: Majestic arrangements of colorful coral sway to the rhythm of the tide, with plenty of aquatic visitors stopping by to enjoy the scenery.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore
programme.desc: On a trip to Amman, one of the world’s oldest cities, Shaunak finds himself taken back to a different stage of the city’s history at every turn.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Quest Fort Begu 2, India
programme.desc: While the vast majority of Rajasthan’s inhabitants have always been staunch vegetarians, there has been tremendous popularity of the meat dishes in the state’s culinary culture. This came mainly from the Rajput rulers, which is why Alex meets Ajayraj Singh who comes from a royal lineage. He introduces her to the history of the valiant rulers of Mewar and some of the secret meat preparations of the kingdom

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Timeless Tamil Nadu Thanjavur, India
programme.desc: Alex takes a trip to Thanjavur, curious about why it has always been called “the cradle of arts”. Soon, she is lost in the magnificence of the Great Living Chola Temples, with their stunning architecture and intricate carvings, rich in symbolism. At a center for making bronze statues, she is surprised to find out how ancient is the art form. The highlight of her trip, however, is a visit to a workshop for making musical instruments, where she is treated to an impromptu performance.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Bucket List Hitoyoshi, Japan
programme.desc: A classic steam locomotive leading you to a relaxing hot spring bath in the mountainside - sounds like a story, doesn’t it? Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty make this story come true with an onsen or a traditional Japanese hot spring bath in Hitoyoshi, an idyllic town surrounded by mountains and blessed with the Kumagawa river.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Viajar Mexico Villa Del Carbon
programme.desc: From greenery and culture to spiritual power, Charlie reveals the things that make some of Mexico’s towns ‘Pueblo Magicos’.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Xplore
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Jordan Jerash, Jordan
programme.desc: Shaunak visits the Roman ruins strewn across an ancient city that was buried in sand for hundreds of years.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Quest Heritage Haveli, India
programme.desc: Where many ancient Indian civilizations flourished in the most resource-filled areas, the people of Rajasthan created a powerful, complex, layered and regal culture and cuisine in the largely arid land that they called home. Alex discovers this when she meets Anjali Singh, a member of the royal family of Jaipur, who shows her how to make two prized recipes from her family’s legacy - Papad Ki Chutney and Safed Murg.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Timeless Tamil Nadu Nilgiris, India
programme.desc: Ooty has been known to charm visitors ever since British officers used to go there to escape the infamous Indian summer. Sipping tea at the tiered tea plantations, strolling by serene lakes and gushing waterfalls, gawking at gentle deer and majestic elephants at Mudumalai National Park, Alex loses herself in the breathtaking natural beauty of this retreat nestled in the Nilgiri hills.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Bucket List Takachiho, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try bungee jumping at the staggeringly high Kobae Bridge. Following this, they explore some rejuvenating nature trails at Takachiho, stumble upon a shrine in a park, and learn the story behind it in a riveting manner, later that day.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Viajar Mexico Ciudad De Mexico
programme.desc: Enter Charlie Rubio: a bona fide Mexican, who is here to reveal all the wonderful things that make Mexico his favorite place in the world.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Xplore
programme.desc: Shaunak navigates the lost city of Petra that was once the capital of the powerful Nabatean empire.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Bihar’s rural heartland has a lot to offer the intrepid traveller. Alex meets Rajesh Ramjan, a politician, a cultural conservationist and a foodie, who shows her the beauty of Bihar’s countryside and introduces her to some traditional Bihari dishes. From dahi-chura, the Bihari breakfast of champions to flavourful preparations of fresh local vegetables simmering on a traditional stove, Alex gets an understanding of the nourishing cuisine that fuels farmers to toil in the fields all day.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Timeless Tamil Nadu Kodaikanal, India
programme.desc: Kodaikanal - the name means “The Gift of the Forest”. True to its name, the cozy hill station nestled in Tamil Nadu’s Palani Hills is captivating with its verdant hills, cascading waterfalls, and postcard-perfect lakes. Alex is truly astonished, however, when she stumbles onto an observatory here that has been tracking solar activity for around 115 years!

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: The caldera, Mount Aso, is home to Japan’s most active volcano. It is also the perfect destination for those seeking an adrenaline rush and some breathtaking views. Amidst the various moods of the caldera, Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty explore the unique experiences this caldera has to offer.

programme.title: City breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 City breaks Samarkand, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Stories of king Timur’s reign and the Silk road lie in the mosaic-covered masterpieces of ancient Samarkand.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Xplore
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Xplore Jordan Wadi Rum
programme.desc: Shaunak is enchanted by the surreal landscape of Wadi Rum in Jordan, but the highlight of his trip is finding an ancient map hidden in a cave.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Considered among the oldest communities in India, the Gaud Saraswat Brahmans have a culture and cuisine that is still largely unexplored. Eisha sets out to explore the lesser-known flavours of this cuisine with the renowned chef, Sudip Pai, who introduces her to some of the culinary gems of his community. While she cooks with him, she also comes to know about the beliefs and traditions that govern the cuisine and way of life of the community.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Timeless Tamil Nadu Madurai, India
programme.desc: During her travels across Tamil Nadu, Alex finally reaches one of India’s most famous pilgrimage sites – Madurai. She pays her respects at the nerve center of the city – the Meenakshi Amman Temple. Her exploration of Madurai reveals to her, however, that there is another, rather delightful side to this revered city.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E48 Xp Guide Kutna Hora, Czech Republic
programme.desc: The medieval treasury of Czech kings, Kutná Hora owes its prominence to its mines. In fact, the richness of the city’s silver mines was what saw it declared a royal city and made the seat of the Bohemian Royal Mint. As Rohan visits the city’s significant monuments such as a cathedral dedicated to the patron saint of all miners and the erstwhile central mint of the country, he finds out interesting stories about its mining and minting history.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Narlai & Jawai, India
programme.desc: The need for a short, refreshing break leads Asmita to a quaint hamlet in Rajasthan, where life has remained unchanged since the 15th century.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Xplore
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Xplore Jordan Dead Sea
programme.desc: Shaunak visits the ‘City of Mosaics’ in Jordan, where he sees a 6th century mosaic map of the Holy Land on the floor of an ancient Byzantine church.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: For the ever-dwindling Parsi community of western India, food is both pleasure and heritage — and a secret language in danger of dying out. Eisha meets the renowned food blogger and caterer, Mehnaz Mansud, who introduces her to some of the forgotten recipes of Parsi cuisine such as Dodima Gosht, the unusual and yet sublime fusion of mutton and bottle gourd.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Timeless Tamil Nadu Karaikudi, India
programme.desc: A town defined by medieval grandeur, Karaikudi transports Alex to the era when affluent Chettiar merchants built splendid mansions as a status symbol. At one of these mansions, the secrets of the Chettinad cuisine, heavy on meat and heat, begin to unfold.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 Xp Guide Cesky Krumlov
programme.desc: Český Krumlov Castle is one of the most important monuments in Central Europe in terms of architectural standard, cultural tradition and scale.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: With just 48 hours on hand, London-based adventurer, Natalie Gayle has set out to explore the true character of the Lion City: Singapore.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Timeless Tamil Nadu Rameshwaram, India
programme.desc: In the last leg of her journey in Tamil Nadu, Alex visits one of India’s southernmost towns, Rameshwaram. Here, she is treated to stunning views of azure waters and coral islands that stretch all the way to Sri Lanka. What she doesn't expect to find, however, are the ruins of a ghost town sitting on a beach.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Great World Hotels The Residence (ENG)
programme.desc: Frieshia feels the magic of Mauritius through the unique blend of modernity and tradition offered at the luxury resort.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E34 XP Guide Bangkok, Thailand
programme.desc: Derived from Thai words, "Bang" meaning Village and "Kok" meaning Olive, the city transformed from fishing village to a cosmopolitan as we know today.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 The Food Guide Budapest, Hungary
programme.desc: Traditional Hungarian fare is a hearty affair, not meant for the faint-hearted. The cuisine has imbibed influences from the days of its Ottoman occupation as well as from the other nations of the Austro-Hungarian Empire and traditional Jewish cuisine. Celebrity chef and traveller, Joe Remblance explores the nuances of this cuisine in Budapest, the capital city, through local dishes such as Schnitzel, Gundel Palacsinta, Hungarian Lángos and Tokaji, a sweet Hungarian wine.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: With just 48 hours on hand, London-based adventurer, Natalie Gayle has set out to explore the true character of the Lion City: Singapore.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Timeless Tamil Nadu Rameshwaram, India

programme.desc: Frieshia feels the magic of Mauritius through the unique blend of modernity and tradition offered at the luxury resort.
